quote: Lighted advertisements went running up dark red facades and dissipating again. He would pass girls; he would turn to look; but the prettier the face, the harder it was to take the plunge.
quote_letters: LIGHTED ADVERTISEMENTS WENT RUNNING UP DARK RED FACADES AND DISSIPATING AGAIN HE WOULD PASS GIRLS HE WOULD TURN TO LOOK BUT THE PRETTIER THE FACE THE HARDER IT WAS TO TAKE THE PLUNGE
